headline: Amphenol (APH) Closes $1 Billion Acquisition of Trexon
summary: Amphenol Corporation (NYSE:APH) is one of the 15 Best Aggressive Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. On November 6, Amphenol Corporation (NYSE: APH) announced that it has closed its acquisition of Trexon from Audax Private Equity for about $1 billion in cash. Trexon specializes in providing high-reliability interconnect and cable assemblies mainly for the defense […]

headline: A Fresh Look at Amphenol (APH) Valuation After a Year of Strong Returns
summary: Amphenol (APH) has recorded a steady share price over the past week, following modest gains in the past month and strong returns over the past year. Investors appear to be weighing ongoing growth trends as they review the latest market data. See our latest analysis for Amphenol. Amphenol’s share price is coming off a remarkable run, with a 91.75% year-to-date price return and a staggering 332.94% total shareholder return over five years. While momentum has cooled a bit after recent gains,...
